original_title: หวานมันส์ ฉันคือเธอ ภาค 2
overview: X’s body is once possessed by a female gender. So this time, his friends have an important duty to prove and show to the world that he really is a man, but most of the time the method and technique of proving create some misunderstandings, especially to the girl he has a crush on for a long time.
title: U & ME 2
